summary:
This mod adds a standalone follower.
The speed of movement during battle is 200, the swing speed is 2.5 times.(normal version.)
Not Lore-friendly.
Let's enjoy it!
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]This text is machine translation.[/size]


[size=3]This mod adds a standalone follower. [/size]
[size=3]The speed of movement during battle is 200, the swing speed is 2.5 times.(normal version)[/size]
[color=#f1f1f1][size=3]Her status does not consider game balance.[/size][/color]


[size=3]Name : Tawara[/size][size=2](タワラ、俵) [/size][size=1]※The kanji representation of "俵" is the same as Tawara of "Bunshichi Tawara"(俵 文七) which is a character of Japanese manga "Tenjho Tenge"(天上天下).[/size]
[size=3]Race : Elf (Details are unknown)[/size]
[size=3]Combat Style : Melee (Equipment Score Mults // Melee10, All others1.0)[/size]
[size=3]Body : UNPB[/size]
[size=3]Weight : 100[/size]
[size=3]Location : Froki's Shack[/size]
[size=3]She has a training sword. It limits her swing speed.
Leveling : PC level mult (Max180)
[/size]    Health : Level1=20   The health value is low as compensation of perk performance.
                  Lev 10=95
                  Lev 20=178
                  Lev 50=428


[size=3]Recommend:[/size]
[size=3]Follower management mod[/size]


[size=3]Installation:[/size]
[size=3][color=#ffff00]Be sure to back up the save data before installation.[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Please select and install either normal version or more speed version.[/color][/size]
[size=3]Please clean installation when switching version.[/size]


[size=3]Known Issues:[/size]
[size=3]Misalignment of head equipment[/size]
[size=3]It sometimes pushes out enemies.[/size]
[size=3]After battle is over, the moving speed may not return.[/size]


[size=3]     When her speed does not return:[/size]
[size=3]     Let her move while crouching.[/size]
[size=3]     Or ready and sheathe(While walking).[/size]



[size=4]Credit: [/size][color=#ffffff](ありがとう、そしてありがとう！)[/color]

[size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951]Enhanced Character Edit by ECE team[/url]
